name: The Central Organisation of Finnish Trade Unions SAK
goal: SAK is a confederation of 17 trade unions in industry, the public sector, transport and private services. Promoting the emotional and material welfare of the members of our affiliated unions is the prime concern of SAK.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Employment, Social Affairs, internal market, industry and research, legal affairs
